skills.name: Time in a Bottle
skills.blurb: Zilean stores time as Experience. When he has enough Experience to finish an ally's level, he can right-click them to impart it. Zilean receives as much Experience as he gives. Cannot be used in combat.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Zilean''' generates {{sti|Experience|{{as|{{pp|2;3.5;5;6;12|1;6;11;16;18}} experience}}}} (does not count towards his own [[Experience (champion)|level up]]) every 5 seconds. ''Time in a Bottle'' is on cooldown when the game starts and becomes disabled when '''Zilean''' reaches level 18.

When the amount stored is enough to level up an allied {{tip|champion}} and '''Zilean''' has been out of combat with enemy {{tip|champions}} and {{tip|turrets}} in the last 10 seconds, he can select a target allied champion to initiate a {{fd|1.2}} second {{tip|channel}} which starts after a {{fd|0.5}}-second [[Channel#Casting Times|cast time]] and is also {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} if '''Zilean''' enters combat with enemy champions or turrets.
If the channel is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}}, ''Time in a Bottle'' goes on a 10 second {{sti|cooldown}}, reduced to 1 second if '''Zilean''' interrupted it himself.
A successful channel levels up the target and rewards '''Zilean''' the granted amount of {{sti|{{as|experience}}}} for himself as well.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Zilean generates 1;6;11;16;18 â€’ undefined experience (does not count towards his own Experience (champion)) every 5 seconds. Time in a Bottle is on cooldown when the game starts and becomes disabled when Zilean reaches level 18.
When the amount stored is enough to level up an allied champion and Zilean has been out of combat with enemy champions and turrets in the last 10 seconds, he can select a target allied champion to initiate a 1.2 second channel which starts after a 0.5-second Channel#Casting Times and is also interrupted if Zilean enters combat with enemy champions or turrets.
If the channel is interrupted, Time in a Bottle goes on a 10 second cooldown, reduced to 1 second if Zilean interrupted it himself.

A successful channel levels up the target and rewards Zilean the granted amount of experience for himself as well.
skills.notes:
* ''Time in a Bottle'' marks allied champions with two circles beneath them; the inner one represents how close they are to leveling up, turning golden when able to activate ''Time in a Bottle'' on them.
* The target allied champion is not required to be out of combat to be leveled up by ''Time in a Bottle'' - only '''Zilean''' is.
* '''Zilean''' only consumes the amount of {{sti|{{as|experience}}}} required to level up an allied champion. He retains the excess for later use.
* The target allied champion is not required to be within range of '''Zilean''' for the channel to complete successfully, it will complete regardless of if they move to a far distance.
* The channel from ''Time in a Bottle'' is not interrupted even if the allied champion suddenly levels up. However, no experience will be granted to either player, and the passive will not go on cooldown.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Zilean''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|channel|attack=interrupts|cast=interrupts|move=interrupts|items=interrupts,true,,false|consume=true|spells=true, interrupts, interrupts, interrupts, interrupts|interrupts=death, silence}}

skills.name: Time Bomb
skills.blurb: Tosses a bomb to target area that sticks to units that come near it (prioritizes Champions). It detonates after 3 seconds, dealing area of effect damage. If a Time Bomb is detonated early by another Time Bomb, it also stuns enemies.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zilean''' throws a ticking time bomb to the target location that grants {{tip|sight}} of its surroundings and detonates after 3 seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies.

The bomb will attach itself to units hit directly, or those who move within a small radius of its center while it is on the ground, {{tip|sight|revealing}} them and detonating at their location when the duration ends, or immediately when they die.
The bomb detonates immediately if another bomb attaches itself to the same unit, {{tip|stun|stunning}} all nearby enemies for a duration.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Zilean throws a ticking time bomb to the target location that grants sight of its surroundings and detonates after 3 seconds, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies.
The bomb will attach itself to units hit directly, or those who move within a small radius of its center while it is on the ground, revealing them and detonating at their location when the duration ends, or immediately when they die.
The bomb detonates immediately if another bomb attaches itself to the same unit, stunning all nearby enemies for a duration.
skills.notes:
* ''Time Bombs'' landing directly on top of multiple units follow a priority order for whom to attach themselves to.
*# Units already carrying a bomb
*# Enemy champions
*# Allied champions
*# Enemy minions
*# Allied minions
* ''Time Bombs'' are not visible to enemies if they attach to an ally that is {{tip|stealth|stealthed}} and vice versa.
* When ''Time Bomb'' snaps onto an enemy, it deals 0 true damage ({{pending for test}}: damage sourcetype?).
** This triggers [[combat status|in-combat]] effects such as drawing {{tip|turret}} aggression and applying {{ii|Elixir of Sorcery}}.
* '''Zilean''' can detonate an enemy counterpart's ''Time Bomb'' by placing his own on the same unit (the first bomb still deals damage).
* ''Time Bomb'' will be dispelled if the holder takes fatal damage and is saved by {{tip|resurrection}} before it explodes.
* ''Time Bomb'' can deal damage to the enemy holder through {{tip|untargetable|untargetablility}}.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will prevent the application of ''Time Bomb'' and it's detonation damage as well as block the {{tip|stun}}, but not it's immediate detonation if the target already has a ''Time Bomb'' on them.

skills.name: Rewind
skills.blurb: Zilean can prepare himself for future confrontations, reducing the cooldowns of his other basic abilities.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zilean''' reduces {{ais|Time Bomb|Zilean}} and {{ais|Time Warp|Zilean}} {{sti|cooldown|cooldowns}} by 10 seconds each.
skills.descriptionHtml: Active: Zilean reduces Zilean's Time Bomb and Zilean's Time Warp cooldowns by 10 seconds each.
skills.notes: * ''Rewind'' can only be cast when either of his basic abilities are on {{sti|cooldown}}.

skills.name: Time Warp
skills.blurb: Zilean bends time around any unit, decreasing an enemy's Movement Speed or increasing an ally's Movement Speed for a short time.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zilean''' bends time around the target champion, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for {{fd|2.5}} seconds if they are an enemy or granting them {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for the same duration if they are an ally or himself.
skills.descriptionHtml: Active: Zilean bends time around the target champion, slowing them for 2.5 seconds if they are an enemy or granting them bonus movement speed for the same duration if they are an ally or himself.

skills.name: Chronoshift
skills.blurb: Zilean places a protective time rune on an allied champion, teleporting the champion back in time if they take lethal damage.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zilean''' places a protective time rune on the target allied {{tip|champion}} or himself for 5 seconds.

If the target takes {{tip|death|fatal damage}} in the duration, they enter {{tip|resurrection}} for 3 seconds, during which they are in {{tip|stasis (buff)|stasis}}, and are afterwards {{tip|heal|healed}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Zilean places a protective time rune on the target allied champion or himself for 5 seconds.
If the target takes fatal damage in the duration, they enter resurrection for 3 seconds, during which they are in stasis, and are afterwards healed.
skills.notes:
* ''Chronoshift's'' {{tip|untargetability}} from the {{tip|stasis (buff)|stasis}} does not {{tip|homing projectile destruction|destroy}} in-flight {{tip|projectiles}}.
* ''Chronoshift'' cannot target {{tip|clone|clones}}.
* ''Chronoshift'' takes priority over all other {{tip|resurrection}} effects as well as all {{tip|zombie state}} effects.
* ''Chronoshift'' does not activate if the target is killed by the {{tip|Nexus Obelisk}}.
* While in {{tip|stasis (buff)|stasis}}, the target's [[health regeneration]] is set to 0.
* The target's screen will have a white tint.
